suppress.notes: CVE-2018-1258 we do not use Spring Method Security, so this does not affect us. see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258. we are on latest Spring Framework version : 5.2.2.RELEASE : https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/wiki/Spring-Framework-Versions This is confirmed as false positive and hence it is suppressed (https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/2952)
This CVE appears in the latest version of wiremock, WireMock 2.27.2 JRE 8 embeds jquery-3.4.1.min.js. see(https://github.com/tomakehurst/wiremock/issues/1417)

In logback version 1.2.7 and prior versions, an attacker with the required privileges to edit configurations files could craft a malicious configuration allowing to execute arbitrary code loaded from LDAP servers.
Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference in GitHub repository liquibase/liquibase prior to 4.8.0.
jackson-databind before 2.13.0 allows a Java StackOverflow exception and denial of service via a large depth of nested objects.
spring boot issue, upgrading to new version broke functional tests.
Spring Framework older unsupported versions, it is possible for a user to provide a specially crafted SpEL expression that may cause a denial of service condition
In Spring Framework versions 5.3.0 - 5.3.16 and older unsupported versions, it is possible for a user to provide a specially crafted SpEL expression that may cause a denial of service condition.

In Spring Framework versions 5.3.0 - 5.3.18, 5.2.0 - 5.2.20, and older unsupported versions, the patterns for disallowedFields on a DataBinder are case sensitive which means a field is not effectively protected unless it is listed with both upper and lower case for the first character of the field, including upper and lower case for the first character of all nested fields within the property path.

In Apache Tomcat 10.1.0-M1 to 10.1.0-M16, 10.0.0-M1 to 10.0.22, 9.0.30 to 9.0.64 and 8.5.50 to 8.5.81 the Form authentication example in the examples web application displayed user provided data without filtering, exposing a XSS vulnerability. It can looked into in the next major releases, if any latest versions released.

Versions of the Amazon AWS Apache Log4j hotpatch package before log4j-cve-2021-44228-hotpatch-1.3.5 are affected by a race condition that could lead to a local privilege escalation. CVE-2022-33915 occured, despite latest versions used.
The RipudamanKaushikDal/projects repository through 2022-04-03 on GitHub allows absolute path traversal because the Flask send_file function is used unsafely.
The nrlakin/homepage repository through 2017-03-06 on GitHub allows absolute path traversal because the Flask send_file function is used unsafely.
